content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price I am asking for is 700 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 650 Euro. Thank you.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for accepting my rental price of 650 Euros per month. I am happy to have you as a tenant in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.

I agree to the price of 650 Euro. Thank you.

I want to know if there is a possibility of a lower price.

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are a student and want to be on good terms with your landlord. However, the rental price I am asking for is 700 Euros per month, which is the market rate for a 25-square meter apartment in Mannheim. I am unable to lower the price any further. I hope you understand and are willing to accept this price. If you have any other questions, please feel free to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
